column4: hi there, fellow Ubuntuers. I installed Ubuntu on my netbook and having some probs with the battery indicator. It shows how many percent that's left, but It just says (calculating...) on how much time there is left.
the best resource I've found with things that are laptop-specific(as this issue probably is) is linux-laptop.com
there are forums dedicated to makes/models of netbooks, and most problems I've had, someone else has bhad and posted about
although it's likely that almoxarife knows more about this than I do, as he certainly seems more confident than I feel about my "check this out and hope it helps" answer. lol. =P
